SOMB.F.summary: Stockmann Oyj Abp engages in retailing business in Finland and internationally. It operates through Lindex and Stockmann segments. The Stockmann segment operates department stores; and stockmann.com, an online store. It operates 8 department stores, which offer fashion, cosmetics, and home products. The Lindex segment offers women's wear, lingerie, children's wear, and cosmetics through the Lindex fashion chain. It operates 464 stores in 19 countries, as well as Lindex.com, an online store. Stockmann Oyj Abp was founded in 1862 and is based in Helsinki, Finland.
